basePlanCode.description:
This is the code of existing plan on the basis of which you want to create a new plan. It is a mandatory attribute. Here is a list of all the base plans along with their codes:-

      1. (Free, free) 2. (Trial, trial) 3. (Outreach (Monthly), paid-monthly) 4. (Outreach (Yearly), paid-yearly) 5. (Email Outreach (Lifetime), ltd-email-outreach) 6. (Outreach (Lifetime), ltd-email-outreach-pro) 7. (Starter (Monthly), email-starter-monthly) 8. (Starter (Yearly), email-starter-yearly) 9. (Outreach (Monthly), email-outreach-monthly) 10. (Outreach (Yearly), email-outreach-yearly) 11. (Outreach Basic (Monthly), email-outreach-basic-monthly) 12. (Outreach Pro (Monthly), email-outreach-pro-monthly) 13. (Outreach Scale (Monthly), email-outreach-scale-monthly) 14. (Outreach Basic (Yearly), email-outreach-basic-yearly) 15. (Outreach Pro (Yearly), email-outreach-pro-yearly) 16. (Outreach Scale (Yearly), email-outreach-scale-yearly) 17. (Outreach Scale - LTD (5000 prospects), ltd-email-outreach-scale-5k) 18. (Outreach Scale - LTD (10,000 prospects), ltd-email-outreach-scale-10k) 19. (Outreach Scale - LTD (15,000 prospects), ltd-email-outreach-scale-15k) 20. (Outreach Scale - LTD (40,000 prospects), ltd-email-outreach-scale-40k) 21. (Outreach Scale - LTD (80,000 prospects), ltd-email-outreach-scale-80k) 22. (Outreach Scale - LTD (120,000 prospects), ltd-email-outreach-scale-120k) 23. (Outreach Scale - LTD (160,000 prospects), ltd-email-outreach-scale-160k) 24. (Outreach Scale - 75k (Yearly), email-outreach-scale-75k-yearly 25. (Outreach Scale - 75k (Monthly), email-outreach-scale-75k-monthly 26. (Outreach Business - 150k (Yearly), email-outreach-business-150k-yearly) 27. (Outreach Business - 150k (Monthly), email-outreach-business-150k-monthly) 28. (Outreach Business - 250k (Yearly), email-outreach-business-250k-yearly) 29. (Outreach Business - 250k (Monthly), email-outreach-business-250k-monthly) 30. (Outreach Business - 500k (Yearly), email-outreach-business-500k-yearly) 31. (Outreach Business - 500k (Monthly), email-outreach-business-500k-monthly)

planName.description: This is the name you want to give to your plan. This will be visible on the web UI. It is a required attribute.

amount.description: This is the amount of your plan. It is a required attribute.

stripePlanId.description: This is planId created in stripe. You can contact product team to get this for your plan. Also this is an optional attribute and if you don't want to set it you can skip it, which will generally be the case with LTD plans.

featureLimits.description:
featureLimits helps you in imposing limits over certain features. It is a required attribute. Currently we only have two features with limits namely email sending(EMAIL.SEND) and prospect add (PROSPECT.ADD). If you wish to not pass any limit you can simply send empty object and if you wish to pass limits on only feature you can also pass only that feature. Egs :-

    featureLimits:{}
    featureLimits:{"EMAIL.SEND":"10000"}
    featureLimits:{
      "EMAIL.SEND":"10000", 
      "PROSPECT.ADD":"150000", 
      "SEQUENCE.EMAIL_ACCOUNT":"10", 
      "EMAIL_ACCOUNT_SETTING.MIN_INTERVAL":"20",
      "EMAIL_ACCOUNT_SETTING.MIN_INTERVAL_DIFFERENCE":"10", 
      "EMAIL_ACCOUNT_SETTING.MAX_DAILY_EMAIL_SENDING_LIMIT":"50", 
      "PROSPECT.MAX_ACTIVE":"5000",
      "AI_VARIANT.CREDIT":"500",
      "SEQUENCE.AI_SEQUENCE_GENERATOR": "10"
    }

example.description: Find the employee size of the company
example.instructions:
Using {{Company}} and {{Company Website}}, identify the companyâ€™s employee size range.
Determine the most accurate employee size range using publicly available sources. If the range cannot be determined, return exactly: Undisclosed.

Output only one value, which must be one of the following ranges: 1-10, 11-50, 51-100, 101-200, 201-500, 501-1000, 1001-5000, 5001-10,000, 10,001+.
Do not include explanations, commentary, or extra text.
Output exactly the range or Undisclosed.
Write just one example result and ensure the output is clear, concise, and follows the specified format exactly.

post.description: This API can be used to update the time interval of an email account.This API requires id of the email account for which the interval needs to be updated. To get the email account id, login to a user account, then to go Settings -> Email Accounts and click on an email account for which the interval needs to be updated. Now, you can find the email account id in the URL.e.g. If the user is https://my.saleshandy.com/settings/email-accounts/5750/general-settings, then 5750 is the email account id.

requestBody.description: Pass the email account id along with the new interval to be used. You can also update only one end of the interval range, i.e., update either min or max interval only.

payload.title: Employee Size Range Finder
payload.instructions:
Using {{Company}} and {{Company Website}}, identify the companyâ€™s employee size range.
Determine the most accurate employee size range using publicly available sources. If the range cannot be determined, return exactly: Undisclosed.

Output only one value, which must be one of the following ranges: 1-10, 11-50, 51-100, 101-200, 201-500, 501-1000, 1001-5000, 5001-10,000, 10,001+.
Do not include explanations, commentary, or extra text.
Output exactly the range or Undisclosed.
Write just one example result and ensure the output is clear, concise, and follows the specified format exactly.

payload.title: Email Subject Line Generator
payload.instructions:
I own a product [YOUR_PRODUCT_NAME] and I want to approach my prospect to [STATE_PURPOSE_OF_EMAIL]. Prospect Details: {{First Name}} {{Last Name}} {{Company}}, {{Company Website}}. Write a cold email subject line for my outreach.

Strict output guidelines:

Output only the subject line text, with no explanations or extra text.
Generate exactly one subject line per request.
The subject line must be below 60 characters.
The tone must be natural, conversational, and professional â€” not robotic or promotional.
Avoid exaggerated promises or clickbait.

Cold email subject line optimization approach:
Create a subject line that makes the recipient WANT to open the email. Focus on what's in it for THEM, not what you want from them.

Effective subject line strategies (choose 1-2 that best fit):
- Lead with specific benefit/result: "Increase [Company]'s revenue by 25%"
- Create curiosity gap: "The mistake 80% of [industry] companies make"
- Personalize with relevance: "[Name], quick idea for [Company]"
- Reference their business: "3 ways to improve [Company]'s [specific area]"
- Share social proof: "How [similar company] increased [metric]"
- Offer specific value: "Free audit of [Company]'s [process]"
- Industry insight: "New trend affecting [industry] companies"
- Problem-solution: "Fixing [Company]'s [common pain point]"

AVOID: Questions, generic phrases, or anything that sounds like marketing spam.
PRIORITIZE: Specific benefits, personal relevance, and clear value to the recipient.

The output should feel like a genuine message written by a human who understands their business needs, not marketing copy.

payload.title: Email Content Generator
payload.instructions:
I own a product [YOUR_PRODUCT_NAME] and I want to approach my prospect to [STATE_PURPOSE_OF_EMAIL]. Prospect Details: {{First Name}} {{Last Name}} {{Company}}, {{Company Website}}. Write a cold email body for my prospect.

Strict output guidelines:

Output only the cold email body text, with no explanations or extra text.
The cold email body should be between 60 and 90 words.
Structure the cold email naturally with:
Personalized opener (icebreaker).
Context (why you're reaching out).
Value line (subtle mention of your product or service without hype).
Soft call-to-action (e.g., ""Would you be open to a quick chat?"").
Avoid exaggerated promises, clickbait, or pushy language.
Use plain text style (no HTML, no emojis, no bold/italics).

Refining rules you may apply:
Personalize with the prospect's role, company, or industry context.
Subtly reference industry trends or challenges.
Keep sentences short and human-like.
Make the cold email feel like a genuine message written by a person, not marketing copy.

400.description: 1001: No master template Found
